hero.title: From Enquiry to Bind — in a Single Conversation
hero.subtitle: An agentic AI journey for global insurance broking that unifies client onboarding, placement, and servicing with governed human oversight.

personas.name: Client Lead
bullets: Global corporate with multiple subsidiaries across regions
Renewing a multi-line insurance programme and exploring coverage uplift
Wants a single point of contact and faster, clearer placement outcomes

personas.name: Lead Broker
bullets: Manages renewals, mid-term adjustments, and new placements across territories
Uses governed AI to triage, prepare meeting briefs, and orchestrate market engagement
Maintains human approval gates for compliance, placement strategy, and bind

clientModel.note: Client-agnostic example using a global parent with regional subsidiaries and carrier relationships. Use External IDs to align with FSC loads.

phases.title: Intake & Qualification
phases.summary: Prioritise accounts, initiate structured onboarding, and confirm compliance before market engagement.

steps.title: Broker homepage prioritises active demand
steps.summary: A dynamic list surfaces the highest-value renewals, at-risk programmes, and urgent servicing signals.
agentActions: Ranks renewals by premium-at-risk, claims volatility, and time-to-expiry
Explains the score drivers and suggests next best actions
Drafts a personalised outreach email based on account context
humanOversight: Broker reviews the prioritisation rationale
Broker edits and approves the outreach before sending

artifacts.text: Draft email to the client’s Risk Buyer summarising renewal timeline, key discussion points, and requested materials.

steps.title: New relationship / programme quick action
steps.summary: A guided intake captures the programme scope and dynamically adjusts based on line of business and territories.
agentActions: Presents a dynamically rendered, step-based form for programme setup
Auto-populates fields using enrichment and existing global hierarchy matches
Creates initial opportunity shell(s) for requested lines of business
humanOversight: Broker confirms required sections (territories, LoBs, contacts, carriers)
Broker approves any merge/match decision for existing global entities

artifacts.text: Structured capture of requested coverages, territories, key stakeholders, and renewal timing.

steps.title: KYC / sanctions screening gate
steps.summary: Compliance checks execute early to prevent downstream rework and ensure eligibility to trade.
agentActions: Runs sanctions and KYC checks on client entities and key stakeholders
Flags potential hits with confidence scoring and recommended disposition
Routes exceptions to compliance for review with audit trail
humanOversight: Compliance analyst validates and resolves flagged matches
Broker proceeds only when screening status is cleared/approved

artifacts.text: Screening outcome with resolved flags and timestamped approvals.

phases.title: Placement & Market Engagement
phases.summary: Translate intent into a structured submission, select a market panel, and orchestrate carrier outreach.

steps.title: Account 360 consolidates global programme context
steps.summary: Broker reviews the client’s global book of business: policies, premiums, claims, servicing, and milestones across subsidiaries.
agentActions: Surfaces active policies by LoB and territory with premium and commission rollups
Highlights claims trends and servicing hotspots
Identifies concentration risk across carriers
humanOversight: Broker validates what is in/out of scope for this renewal cycle
Broker confirms stakeholders and servicing owners by region

artifacts.text: Rollup of premium, claims, carrier mix, open issues, and renewal dates across subsidiaries.

steps.title: Agentforce account summary (broker briefing)
steps.summary: AI summarises what matters for placement: renewal risk, recent events, open items, and recommended focus areas.
agentActions: Summarises programme performance and renewal risk drivers
Pulls relevant external signals (news, regulatory, sector risks) when enabled
Generates a concise broker brief with talking points
humanOversight: Broker verifies external signal relevance and removes noise
Broker approves the brief for meeting preparation

artifacts.text: Summary of renewal risks, coverage gaps, open servicing, and proposed discussion agenda.

steps.title: Pre-meeting toolkit generates renewal strategy
steps.summary: The toolkit assembles coverage gaps, market appetite suggestions, and cross-sell options into a meeting-ready pack.
agentActions: Produces meeting agenda and talking points aligned to risks and timeline
Suggests cross-sell (e.g., parametric, trade credit, cyber uplift) based on rules
Lists required artifacts: loss runs, schedules, wordings, risk questionnaire
humanOversight: Broker edits agenda and confirms the negotiation posture
Broker confirms what can be shared with client vs internal-only

artifacts.text: Agenda, risks, renewal timeline, recommended coverages, and requested documents checklist.

steps.title: Market panel selection & appetite routing
steps.summary: AI proposes a carrier panel and routes outreach based on appetite, territory, and placement strategy.
agentActions: Suggests carrier panel and alternates using appetite rules and prior outcomes
Drafts carrier outreach messages and submission request emails
Creates tasks for specialist teams (e.g., cyber, marine, D&O) by region
humanOversight: Broker approves carrier panel and exclusions
Broker approves outreach wording and submission scope before sending

artifacts.text: Structured email requesting indications and terms, with risk highlights and required attachments.

phases.title: Quote, Bind & Documentation
phases.summary: Aggregate quotes, compare terms, obtain approvals, and generate bind documentation with audit-ready traceability.

steps.title: Submission pack assembly and distribution
steps.summary: Agent compiles a clean submission pack from structured intake, attachments, and standard templates.
agentActions: Extracts key data from uploaded loss runs, schedules, and questionnaires (when enabled)
Validates completeness against checklist and flags missing items
Packages and distributes the submission pack to selected markets
humanOversight: Broker verifies extracted fields and approves final pack version
Broker confirms distribution list and timing

artifacts.text: Consolidated submission including risk summary, schedules, claims, and requested terms.

steps.title: Quote ingestion and comparison
steps.summary: Incoming quotes are normalised into comparable terms, pricing, and exclusions across carriers.
agentActions: Ingests quote documents and normalises key fields (premium, limits, deductibles, exclusions)
Builds a side-by-side comparison table and highlights deltas
Flags non-standard clauses and recommends questions to carriers
humanOversight: Broker validates normalised terms and highlights
Broker decides shortlist and negotiation priorities

artifacts.text: Carrier-by-carrier comparison of premium, coverage, exclusions, and conditions.

steps.title: Bind decision with approval gates
steps.summary: Bind is executed only after approvals, checks, and required governance steps are satisfied.
agentActions: Routes bind recommendation to required approvers (broker lead, compliance, finance) based on thresholds
Creates bind checklist and captures approvals with timestamps
Generates bind confirmation draft and coverage summary for client
humanOversight: Approvers review recommendation and approve/reject with rationale
Broker confirms bind instruction and client communication

artifacts.text: Client-facing confirmation summarising bound terms, key dates, and next steps.

phases.title: Post-bind Service & Insight Loop
phases.summary: Log outcomes, allocate revenue, manage servicing, and feed insights back into renewal strategy.

steps.title: Voice agent logs meeting outcomes and actions
steps.summary: After a client meeting, broker uses voice to capture decisions, create opportunities, and assign tasks in seconds.
agentActions: Creates new opportunities (e.g., cyber uplift, APAC marine placement) from a spoken summary
Logs call report and generates interaction summary
Creates tasks (request loss runs, schedule follow-up, engage regional specialists) and assigns owners
humanOversight: Broker reviews created records and corrects any misinterpreted fields
Broker confirms assignments and due dates

artifacts.text: Auto-generated meeting notes, decisions, and next steps linked to the client record.

steps.title: Revenue share attribution and insight capture
steps.summary: The outcome updates global reporting, revenue sharing, and the advisory loop using post-bind and servicing data.
agentActions: Allocates revenue share across teams based on originating vs executing roles
Captures claims/servicing insight for risk advisory recommendations
Suggests renewal and cross-sell actions based on new signals and outcomes
humanOversight: Broker lead validates revenue allocation and ownership
Broker approves advisory recommendations before sharing with client

artifacts.text: Claims and servicing learnings translated into risk mitigation and coverage optimisation recommendations.

governance.title: Governance
bullets: Human approval gates for bind decisions and sensitive actions
Audit logging for agent actions and data access
Data lineage for summaries and extracted fields (where enabled)
Model guardrails and prompt controls aligned to policy
